channel.title: Assistance with my server
channel.description:
Hello, i am new to these forums, but you all seem to know what you are talking about.
I have a problem with my server. I have managed to do everything in the tutorials provided, although my server will not let other people connect, also, i can only connect via the server ip - 0.0.0.0
I am not sure what is wrong, i have no-ip, i have the latest version of java, I can acess it with that i.p, but i don't understand what could be wrong.
My router is a D-link, if that may help with your thoughts. I appreciate any help. Thankyou.

item.title: Assistance with my server

@Teabag wrote:

that hasn’t worked… i don’t think, try it now.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 20, 2008, 03:28:29 PM[/size][hr]Does it work?

item.title: Assistance with my server
item.dc:creator: @Teabag Teabag
item.description:
@Teabag wrote:

I have a port opened with the name Rsps, it has a tick in the box, is a TCP and is in the Exeptions section of the firewall.

And I have portforwarded.
